name: Hunters Point Family
description: Our mission is to prepare youth and young adults to become independent, strong and productive adults through comprehensive support services that empower them to develop their full potential. The Hunters Point Family's vision is to strengthen and empower our youth so that they may become wise, compassionate and powerful leaders who will help transform Bayview Hunters Point into a thriving and healthy community.
